lines: THERE IS SUNLIGHT ON THE HILLTOP
1. Ya Tlhavile Egangeni Na Le Lwandle Masana, Miseve Yi Tlhave Emadyelweni Ya Rihlaza;
Mina Ndzi Na Rivoningo Ra Ntamu Embilwini, Ri Huma Ka Muponisi La Tshameke Ka Mina.
Masana Lama Xongeke, Masana Embilwini; Yesu U Susa Gome Hi Masana Mbilwini.
2. Ntshurini Ndzi Siya Gome Bya Nguvu Leya Khale, Ndzi Ta Ambexiwa Ntsako Ndzi Tala Ku Vonga;
Kona Kaya Ro Kwetsima Hi Nsovo Wa Ndzi Nyika, Tlhandluka Mbilu Ya Mina, Moya Wanga Landzela.
3. Yesu U Ndzi Kutsurile, Se Ndzi Wa Yena Ntsena, Rivoningo Ra Rirhandzu A Ri Ku Kwetsimise;
Kaya Leri Kwetsimaka, U Ndzi Nyike Nsovo, Tlhandluka Mbilu Ya Mina, Moya Wanga Landzela.
